nodes.text: This reconnaissance vessel was a rocket-like hyperspace-capable starship. Prior to the Battle of Jakku, Alliance Admiral Gial Ackbar dispatched a group of these vessels to investigate reports of an Imperial Star Destroyer near Jakku, with support from the New Republic's 77 Squadron of X-wing starfighters. In the skirmish that followed, the fighters protected the ships from TIE fighters and took out the Star Destroyer before the entire group jumped to hyperspace.

In the Hyperspace Mountain Star Wars-themed overlay to Disney's Space Mountain roller coaster, the ride's sled-like rocket vehicles portrayed the unidentified "reconnaissance vessels" named by Admiral Ackbar in a video played in the attraction's queue.
